Description: You will assist with the efficient running of the department in line with Hyatt International's Corporate Strategies and brand standards, whilst meeting employee, guest and owner expectations. The Fire Officer is responsible to assist the policies and procedures relating to fire, hygiene, health and safety, conducting regular checking of the safety and fire related issues, and smooth and efficient running of the Engineering Department in support of all other operating departments. Minimum 2 years college or technical school; or 6 months to 1-year related experience and/or training; or Equivalent combination of education and experienceJob Details
